#summary Release notes for v0.4 test build
#labels Featured

==Release notes for v0.4 test build ([http://snackr.googlecode.com/files/Snackr-v0.4.air click to download)]==

*IMPORTANT*: Before installing a test build, please [http://code.google.com/p/snackr/wiki/TestBuildInfo back up your feed database AND your Google Reader feed list]!

* Updated Google Reader integration to use new authentication scheme (Google will be turning off the old authentication scheme on June 15).
* Changed Options icon to a gear.
* feed:// URLs now work.
* Possible fix for reported intermittent memory leaks when Google Reader integration is enabled.
